title: GLAM-Workbench/trove-maps
description:
Current version: v1.0.0

Jupyter notebooks to work with data from Trove’s maps zone.

See the Trove map section of the GLAM Workbench for more details.

Notebook topics

  • Exploring digitised maps in Trove – quantify volume of digitised maps by harvesting and analysing the metadata.

  • Parse map coordinates from metadata – parse coordinate strings from the metadata and convert the values to decimals.

Cite as

See the GLAM Workbench or Zenodo for up-to-date citation details.

This repository is part of the GLAM Workbench.
